sentence.Network_en: Cee En Cee went on to win by a neck from Leigh Crofter.
sentence.Network_cn: 西恩西再次以微弱优势战胜莉·克罗夫特。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... croft 小田地 crofter 佃农 crofting 小农场租期.

entry.tran: (苏格兰的)小农场主，小农场佃户
entry.def: In Scotland, a crofter is a person who lives on a croft or small farm.

means.word_mean: 1. an owner or tenant of a small farm in Great Britain
